overview:
Retired Founder Member and Managing Director of Flowtronics Systems Ltd in England.

At its height this company employed over 100 souls manufacturing a very wide range of electronic equipment and sub-assembies for countless Blue-Chip companies, Major UK utiliities, International Companies, the Defence Industry and more.

In retirement has remarried to a beautiful, young Chinese Lady and has a 10 year old son. Living happily in Spain but looking to move to France, Clive is now a part-time Author and Internet Marketer.

Hi latest areticle (published by EzineArticles can be seen at:
